headline: Targeted Sequencing Industry Intelligence 2020-2030 Featuring Profiles of MGI Tech, GENEWIZ, Agilent Technologies and Other Leading Companies
summary: The Global Targeted Sequencing Market is poised for growth due to rising demand for precise diagnostics in genetic disorders and cancer. Opportunities lie in leveraging AI for data analysis, enhancing personalized treatments, and addressing rare diseases. Challenges include standardization and reimbursement complexities.
